description: Kobayashi Gorou is head of the 2nd Investigate Division of the MIAC`s Statistics Bureau. However, the position is merely a cover as head of Section 3. After the United States invades Tokyo and takes over the Gate, Gorou goes underground with Misaki. He resembles Golgo 13 with glasses, revealing a quite muscular body under his clothes, and has the same rifle.
name: Kobayashi Gorou
